short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab Chrome extension that brings the calming beauty of coastal photos right to your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Escape to the coastal serenity with Coastal Vibes changing backgrounds on every new tab. Embrace the tranquility of the coast while enjoying the convenience of a built-in search bar that empowers your web exploration.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Coastal Vibes extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Yahoo as described by the service in terms of use https://coastalvibesapp.com/tos and Privacy Policy https://coastalvibesapp.com/privacy

Install Coastal Vibes now and embark on a visual and exploratory journey along the breathtaking coastlines from the comfort of your browser.

Note: Coastal Vibes' new tab extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal information.
